text:

YOU SAY EVERYTHING IS FINE BUT IN THE WHITE HOUSE YOU MAKE EVERY ONE TAKE TESTS, WEAR MASKS, WASH THEIR HANDS BEFORE SEEING YOU...YOU DON'T TELL THE PPL THIS 😡
